quotes.text: It is not fair to ask of others what you are unwilling to do yourself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Serious sport has nothing to do with fair play. It is bound up with hatred, jealousy, boastfulness, disregard of all rules and sadistic pleasure in witnessing violence. In other words, it is war minus the shooting.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: To seek greatness is the only righteous vengeance.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: Everyone has the right to make his own decisions, but none has the right to force his decision on others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: Freedom is the right to live as we wish.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The right way is not always the popular and easy way. Standing for right when it is unpopular is a true test of moral character.
quotes.author: Margaret Chase Smith

quotes.text: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Humanity is acquiring all the right technology for all the wrong reasons.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.text: Technology presumes there's just one right way to do things and there never is.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.text: If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I gave my life to become the person I am right now. Was it worth it?
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: You can always count on Americans to do the right thing - after they've tried everything else.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: This is why I loved technology: if you used it right, it could give you power and privacy.
quotes.author: Cory Doctorow

quotes.text: Take no thought of who is right or wrong or who is better than. Be not for or against.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Sometimes it is better to lose and do the right thing than to win and do the wrong thing.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.text: Remember always that you not only have the right to be an individual, you have an obligation to be one.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
